SCTX:
begin boethiabuildScript

short state
short dialogcue

if ( state == -10 ) 
	return
endif

if ( state == 0 )
	if ( "duma gro-lag2"-> GetDisabled == 1 )
		disable
		set state to 10
	endif
endif

if ( state == 10 )
	if ( "duma gro-lag2"-> GetDisabled != 1 )
		enable
		set state to 20
	endif
endif

if ( state == 20 )
	if ( "Ex_DAE_Boethiah_fixed"-> GetDisabled != 1 )
		disable
		set state to -10
		set dialogcue to 20
	endif
endif

end
